name: SEWA TRUST (Social, Educational & Welfare Activities. Trust)
briefDescription: We feel pleasure to introduce ourselves as a voluntary Charitable Trust registered under Indian Trust Act 1882, having its Registration No-18/2015, we have been carrying out our activities for the last 5 year in voluntary Charitable Trust is to provide Education and Health for all especially, to empower women/girl  in rural areas of District-Bhadohi U.P. to engage them with income generation and Nation development activities.        Now our committee has decided to large scale work for Educational and Health development programme at District-Bhadohi, U.P. with financial assistance to voluntary/private organizations for the women community development,
